game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you must explore the forgotten ruins to uncover the lost artifact and return it to the village elder.
game.reward: 100 experience points and a magical amulet

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You've heard rumors that the ruins are hidden behind a waterfall in the western part of the forest.

task.objective: Search for clues inside the ruins
task.description: Solve the puzzles and riddles within the ruins to find out where the artifact is hidden.

task.objective: Recover the artifact and return to Arinthea
task.description: The artifact is in a chest at the end of a long tunnel. Be wary of traps!
